name: Sketchmas 19 - Drentsoft
description:
My entry for the 12 Days of Sketchmas Game Jam 2019.

Keyboard and mouse controls. I went for roughly a mechanic a day. Each "level" is a sort of snapshot of the game as it went. It is very unfinished.

Only the Windows build has been tested.

Most assets used including the music, character sprite/tileset are all CC0 licensed, sourced from OpenGameArt. I will try adding source code later.
